subject: Hockey, Ice
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins will wait until the 2010-11 season to open their new arena, rather than open it during the 2009-10 season as initially planned.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins will wait until the 2010-11 season to open their new arena, rather than open it during the 2009-10 season as initially planned.
